summary: A massive comet is heading towards Earth, threatening to wipe out all life on the planet. Two scientists, Mindy and Kiet, try to warn the government and the public about the impending disaster, but their warnings are met with skepticism and ridicule. The government is more concerned with the upcoming election and the potential impact on the president's popularity than with the impending doom. The scientists' warnings are eventually ignored, and the comet collides with Earth, causing widespread destruction and chaos. As the world comes to an end, people are more concerned with their own personal interests and the entertainment value of the impending disaster than with the fate of humanity.

The government is more concerned with the upcoming election and the potential impact on the president's popularity than with the impending doom. The scientists' warnings are eventually ignored, and the comet collides with Earth, causing widespread destruction and chaos. As the world comes to an end, people are more concerned with their own personal interests and the entertainment value of the impending disaster than with the fate of humanity.
